text:
Christian Weber (1 July 1946 – 12 February 2019) was a German politician. He was the President of the Parliament of Bremen ("Bürgerschaft") from 1999 to 2019 and a member of the Social Democratic Party of Germany (SPD). He was born in Mirsk, Krobica, Poland.
Weber died after a long illness on 12 February 2019 in Bremen, aged 72.
